basics.name: Brandon Cooper
basics.label: Marketing & Communications Consultant
basics.summary: Connecting people and ideas through technology.

work.name: ITFO Communications
work.summary: Providing data-driven insights to inform marketing campaigns and knowledge management (KM) projects for senior leaders of our Fortune 500 client organization.
highlights: Planned and executed the implementation of an organization-wide knowledge management system.
Created content on behalf of senior leaders for their personal publication.
Developed a system in PowerApps to facilitate the access, organization, and tracking of completed RFIs.
Adminstrated ABM web portals using WordPress, making updates to attract visits from client organizations.

work.name: ElementIQ
work.summary: Worked closely with departmental leads to ensure a smooth transition for client services and team members. Retained during the sale of Lifeblood Marketing to ElementIQ, continuing as marketing lead for key accounts.
highlights: Launched new marketing campaigns (inbound, outbound, growth) for key clients, focused on user experience and conversion-rate optimization.
Led the transition of client services following ElementIQ's acquisition of Lifeblood Marketing, developing new company-wide SOPs related to strategy, SEO, and content marketing.

work.name: Lifeblood Marketing (Acquired)
work.description: Botique marketing agency specializing in real estate
work.summary: Supported a tight-knit team by structuring full-service marketing efforts across a wide range of channels. Led marketing strategy and program development for key accounts.
highlights: Managed client's marketing strategies and deliverables including website management and SEO, social media marketing, content and email marketing (e.g., drip campaigns), and PPC.
Successfully developed largest client's marketing strategy, leading to an ongoing relationship that helped to support the sale of Lifeblood Marketing.
Led the restructuring process alongside the client service's lead during acquisition by ElementIQ.

work.name: Hiilite
work.description: Fast-paced marketing startup focused on growth
work.summary: Starting as Content Writer, I was quickly promoted to Communications Manager upon returning from university to work in-office. Both company revenue and number of FTEs more than tripled during my tenure.
highlights: Developed content strategy to ensure consistent growth for small to medium-sized businesses across a wide range of industries
Established departmental roles and responsibilities, task descriptions, and time budgets to define measurable success
Produced and delivered marketing content for top-tier clients to increase conversions and improve user experience
Managed client relationships to further stakeholder buy-in
Conducted content workshops to foster interdepartmental growth

volunteer.summary: Invited to lecture on marketing for students in the course CMNS 130: Introduction to Digital Media each semester.
